definitions.definition: A person employed as an official in a bureaucracy (usually corporate or governmental ) who holds limited authority and primarily serves to carry out a simple function for which discretion is minimal or not required.
Such a person who is petty , pedantic , short-sighted , uncaring , or counterproductive ; sometimes also with implication of being amoral or corrupt .

main_definition: A person employed as an official in a bureaucracy (usually corporate or governmental ) who holds limited authority and primarily serves to carry out a simple function for which discretion is minimal or not required.
secondary_definitions: Such a person who is petty , pedantic , short-sighted , uncaring , or counterproductive ; sometimes also with implication of being amoral or corrupt .
